text: Very warm place, like being at a friends place. Good food. Not for families whit babies.
Ambiance et musique Agréable.  Service courtois.    Fish'N'chip's correct.    Un beau moment de détente.

Très bon restaurant! On se croirait presque à la nouvelle Orléans et pourtant c'est en plein coeur de valleyfield! Tout y est, les spécialités locales, les cocktails. Et en plus on est servis avec un super sourire! On va revenir!
I have been here many times for family dinners. I just love it. The food is great and the restaurant has a nice ambiance. Totally worth going to even though its out of the way.
